title: Metadata Education Strategies: Customized Practical Competency Development for Adult Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic metadata standards and cataloging codes
context.additional_context: Strengthening practical competencies in response to metadata standard revisions (e.g., RDA). Supporting self-directed learning in BYOD environments

learning_goals: Learners can analyze revisions to metadata standards and explain at least three practical strategies for applying them to their work.
Achieve learning outcomes of over 80% using self-assessment tools based on adult learning theory.
Complete a metadata design project based on peer feedback using collaboration tools within the LMS.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
